sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useQuery } from 'react-query'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Users, BookOpen, MessageSquare, Settings, TrendingUp, Calendar, UserPlus, BarChart3 } from 'lucide-react'; import { useAuth } from '../../contexts/AuthContext'; import { adminAPI, announcementsAPI } from '../../services/api'; import LoadingSpinner from '../common/LoadingSpinner'; const AdminDashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); // Fetch statistics const { data: statsData, isLoading: statsLoading } = useQuery( ['admin-statistics'], () => adminAPI.getStatistics() ); // Fetch recent announcements const { data: announcementsData, isLoading: announcementsLoading } = useQuery( ['recent-announcements'], () => announcementsAPI.getRecentAnnouncements(5) ); const stats = statsData?.data || {}; const announcements = announcementsData?.data?.announcements || []; const getPriorityColor = (priority) => { switch (priority) { case 'urgent': return 'bg-red-100 text-red-800 border-red-200'; case 'high': return 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800 border-yellow-200'; case 'normal': return 'bg-blue-100 text-blue-800 border-blue-200'; default: return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800 border-gray-200'; } }; if (statsLoading || announcementsLoading) { return ; } return (
{/* Welcome Section */}

Welcome back, {user?.first_name}!

Administrator Dashboard

{stats.overview?.total_students || 0}

Students

{stats.overview?.total_teachers || 0}

Teachers

{stats.overview?.total_tasks || 0}

Tasks

{stats.overview?.total_submissions || 0}

Submissions

{/* System Overview */}

System Overview

Admin Panel
{/* Students by Grade */}

Students by Grade

{stats.students_by_grade?.map((grade) => (
{grade.grade_name} {grade.student_count} students
))}
{/* Recent Activity */}

System Statistics

Total Classes {stats.overview?.total_classes || 0}
Total Announcements {stats.overview?.total_announcements || 0}
Active Users {(stats.overview?.total_students || 0) + (stats.overview?.total_teachers || 0)}
{/* Sidebar */}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

Add Student Manage System Post Announcement
{/* Recent Announcements */}

Recent Announcements

View All
{announcements.length > 0 ? (
{announcements.map((announcement) => (
{announcement.priority} {new Date(announcement.created_at).toLocaleDateString()}

{announcement.title}

{announcement.content}

))}
) : (

No announcements yet.

)}
); }; export default AdminDashboard;
